programme.title: A Harvest Wedding

programme.desc: The housemates recall some of their absurd moneymaking schemes.

programme.desc: Courtesy of their new housekeeper's magic potions, Blanche's social life perks up and Dorothy wins the battle against insomnia.

programme.desc: Frasier experiences a midlife crisis when broadcasters announce he will receive a lifetime-achievement award.

programme.desc: Frasier and Niles try to boost their masculinity by taking an automobile repair class.

programme.desc: Cliff's storehouse of irrelevant facts is tested when he becomes a contestant on "Jeopardy!".

programme.desc: Rose's cousin, Sven Lindstrom, arrives from Sweden and falls in love with Blanche.

programme.desc: A single woman with a new, out of control German shepherd turns to a handsome dog trainer for help. As they make progress with the dog, she realizes she may be developing feelings for the trainer.

programme.desc: Former dancer Luna pairs up with Bennett, a world-class aerialist, when he finds himself without a partner for his upcoming performance at the local arts festival.

programme.desc: Emily's booming butterfly business delivers monarchs to a birthday party, where she meets Garrett, a single father. With help from Garrett and his daughter, her business soon begins to take flight.

programme.desc: Working on protecting the wildlife in Africa, a biologist teams up with a theme park designer who wants to create an over-the-top safari attraction.

programme.desc: Reporter Brooklyn travels to the Balloon Fiesta to meet hot air balloon pilot Jared, who offers romantic balloon rides but is closed off to love himself.

programme.desc: Niles sinks a half-court shot for a huge prize at a Seattle SuperSonics game, reigniting the sibling rivalry.

programme.desc: Deprived of Van's attention, Cheyenne develops a relationship with the father of her daughter's play date.

programme.desc: Finger-pointing begins when Barbra Jean's new dog goes missing and a psychic tells her someone in the family is to blame.

programme.desc: When Reba enters a beauty pageant for grandmothers, Barbra Jean becomes jealous and sets out to prove she is the true Grandma Hart.

programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when the city's hottest real estate agent wants to interview her for a job, until the woman shows up unannounced for a surprise meeting.

programme.desc: Dorothy, Rose and Blanche seek professional help when living with one another becomes unbearable.

programme.desc: Rose decides to move in with Buddy Rourke, one of her deceased husband's former buddies.

programme.desc: Blanche reunites with her daughter Rebecca after a four-year estrangement; Blanche wants to defend her from an abusive boyfriend.

programme.desc: A Los Angeles event coordinator learns that her estranged uncle has recently passed away and left her a chalet in Vail, Colo.

programme.desc: While consoling each other over the recent loss of their spouses, a man (Warren Christie) and a woman (Lacey Chabert) grow close and fall in love.

programme.title: His & Hers
programme.desc: Lawyers Mark and Dana are the perfect married couple until they find themselves on opposite sides of a highly public divorce case involving a warring reality show couple.

programme.title: Love on Safari
programme.desc: An American web designer inherits an animal reserve in South Africa. A no-nonsense ranger takes her on a safari in hopes that she will fall in love with the land, the animals and him.

programme.title: Groundswell
programme.desc: On the heels of a personal and professional setback, chef Emma travels to Hawaii, where she meets Ben, a handsome, reclusive surf instructor whose lessons help her to regain her footing.

programme.desc: Tess dives into Logan's murder investigation of her friend who was about to propose with her help; as she grows closer to the truth, she fears it could ruin everyone's happily ever after.
